objects.description: [InvisibleFerret](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1245) has collected the local IP address, and external IP.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023)
